altername_name: Magic Girl featuring Ling Ling the Little Witch
name: Magic Girl featuring Ling Ling the Little Witch
overview: When the peace of a communal planet is broken from an attack by alien invaders, it's up to one very special girl named Ling Ling, blessed with the art of powerful magic, to fight for her people. Having lost her family and friends in the assault, this once sweet and loving young woman has been pushed to the brink and will not give up until vengeance is hers. Magic Girl is a vertical shooter set in outer space which consists of 5 different stages, each with its own unique locations, enemies and boss monsters. The player can collect bonuses such as weapon powerups and energy restoration.
